title: Webcam Zone Trigger Pro [Version 2.109]
description:
Webcam Zone Trigger Pro 
                     [Version 2.109]

Have motion detection work for you!

-> Security system for your house, office or store
-> User interaction for a show booth or publicity display
-> Automation for quality insurance
-> Automatic notification upon detection of motion
-> Statistic acquisition
-> No skills required, super simple to use


Connect a webcam to your PC and have it react to many kinds of motion. 
Webcam Zone Trigger is the first multi-purpose motion detection software.
This means that motion detection isn&#039;t just for security anymore.

Simply place Hot Spots anywhere on the video image, move them around and resize
them. 
They detect motion within this area, and when triggered, they perform the 
actions that you have selected.
Useful in such sectors as Art, Marketing, Quality control, automated 
inventory, security and monitoring, motion detection has never hit so close 
to home.

Zone Trigger can do anything!

For each motion detecting Hot Spot, you can choose from a wide range of actions
that Zone Trigger will perform. 
Taking pictures, recording video, playing sounds, executing commands on the 
computer... only a click away.

Upon detection of motion, Zone Trigger can perform the following tasks:

* Play a sound - wav file
* Take a picture - jpeg file
* Record video - avi file
* Upload image to FTP
* Send an email - with included images
* Run a command or program - this can be anything
* Count
* Mouse click
* Keyboard key - a great way to take control over other software, Zone Trigger 
  can emulate hot-keys.
* Toast pop-up - a great way to be notified upon motion, an image of the 
  camera will appear on the desktop.

However, Zone Trigger is such a versatile software that it can be very useful 
even without motion detection.

With Zone Trigger, you can:

* Remote-view on the internet using Zone Trigger&#039;s  internal web server
* Keep detailed logs of everything that happens
* Detect when lights are turned on of off
* Take pictures are regular intervals
* Start Zone Trigger automatically when the computer is turned on
* Schedule when Zone Trigger will start of stop detecting motion
* Can record sound, and also use sound as additional triggers
* Can measure quantities of bulk material (Pro Edition)
* Can detect matches with reference images (Pro Edition)

The Toast Pop-up feature is a non-intrusive way to notify you when motion 
is detected.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Extract all files with winrar.
Install App.
Use Crack provided.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PLEASE SEED WHEN YOU FINISH THE DOWNLOAD.

Enjoy!!
